extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system uses RADIUS/UDP for authentication without the Message-Authenticator attribute enabled.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Message-Authenticator Attribute
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that all RADIUS communications include the Message-Authenticator attribute to provide stronger protection against MitM attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Update RADIUS Implementations
extracted_playbook.description: Apply patches and updates provided by RADIUS software vendors to address the vulnerability.
